via.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: travelling through a place on the way to another place
via.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: We flew to Athens via Paris.
via.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: using a particular person, machine etc to send something
via.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: I sent a message to Kitty via her sister.
